name: Distilled Water
details: Distilled water will be pure and free of sediment that may harm your screen. An example would be a bottle of Dasani, or Deer Park water.

name: Spray Bottle
details: This will aid in the application of the cleaning agent to your cloth.

name: White Vinegar
details: Either this or item number four can be used in conjunction with the distilled water to make a cleaning solution for use on the screen.

name: Isopropyl Alcohol
details: Either this or item number three can be used in conjunction with the distilled water to make a cleaning solution for use on the screen.

name: Measuring Cup
details: This will a method to obtain the proper mix of solution to clean the screen.
